title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 – Kyrie Irving’s Villain Role
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 – Kyrie Irving’s Villain Role
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre fill in for the DP crew and jump right into some NBA, specifically Kyrie Irving embracing the villain role. Plus, Kyler Murray’s future in Arizona seems to be up in the air in, but Doug doesn’t think so from a contract standpoint. The wide receiver market has clearly shifted in the NFL, so does this mean it’s time to pay up for teams? The guys circle back to the energy Kyrie Irving said he’s giving back to fans. 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
